original_text: And the border shall go down to the Jordan, and its limit shall be at the Salt Sea. This shall be your land as defined by its borders all around.”
korean_text: 그 경계가 또 요단으로 내려가서 염해에 이르나니 너희 땅의 사방 경계가 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: And the border shall go down to the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그 경계는 요단 강까지 내려갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: and its limit shall be at the Salt Sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그 끝은 소금 바다에 이를 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as defined by its borders all around
